item.title: How do you make a server? please help
item.dc:creator: @zamorak07 zamorak07
item.description:
@zamorak07 wrote:

To make a server 1st go to the download section and find one you like and download then extract to a file.now run the runserver.bat and open moparscape client and log on normaly with the right port after testing you’r server and you think it’s ok then log of and shut down the runserver.bat and go into the client.java and press ctrl and f when a text box should apper type in there the server name and change all the all server to you’rnew server name save then run compile.bat you may need to download JDK 6 after go to shops to add item to shops or make more or on client add global objects to change you’r server.Im not a really exprinced coder so this is best i can do for you.Hope it helped ;D

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a server? please help
